meanings.definition: The amount of food that can be lifted with a fork.
meanings.sent1: She took small forkfuls of the delicious cake.
meanings.sent2: He ate his dinner in several forkfuls.
meanings.sent3: The tiny forkfuls of salad seemed to be playing hide and seek on her plate.
meanings.sent4: Each forkful of pasta was a journey to flavor town.
meanings.sent5: The forkfuls of soup danced on his taste buds.

meanings.sent1: They enjoyed many forkfuls of the tasty stew.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for two forkfuls of sugar.
meanings.sent3: The forkfuls of berries in the bowl looked like a colorful mosaic.
meanings.sent4: The forkfuls of rice piled high on his plate like a mountain range.
meanings.sent5: With each forkful, she savored the flavors of the dish.
